wizard.title: Welcome to GlobCRM
wizard.subtitle: Let's get {{orgName}} set up in just a few steps.

inviteStep.title: Invite Your Team
inviteStep.description: Add team members by typing or pasting email addresses below. You can always invite more people later from Settings.
inviteStep.emailPlaceholder:
Enter emails separated by commas or new lines
e.g., alice@company.com, bob@company.com
inviteStep.emailHint: Press Enter or click outside to add emails
inviteStep.roleHint: Role assigned to all invited users

configureStep.title: Configure Basics
configureStep.description: Set your organization's default preferences. These can be changed anytime in Settings.

exploreStep.title: Explore Your Data
exploreStep.description: We've added some sample data to help you explore GlobCRM. You can delete this sample data anytime from Settings.
exploreStep.sampleContactsDesc: Pre-loaded contacts to explore contact management features.
exploreStep.sampleCompaniesDesc: Example companies linked to contacts and deals.
exploreStep.demoDealDesc: A deal in your pipeline to explore the sales workflow.
exploreStep.defaultPipelineDesc: 5 stages: Lead, Qualified, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed.
